name: Donna STARK, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL MUTUAL CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY
name_abbreviation: Stark v. Pennsylvania National Mutual Casualty Insurance

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Donna STARK, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL MUTUAL CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas I. Vanaskie, Kevin C. Quinn, Scranton, for appellant.
Howard M. Levinson, Mary Beth Connolly, Wilkes Barre, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
601 A.2d 807
Donna STARK, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL MUTUAL CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 23, 1992.
Decided Feb. 14, 1992.
Thomas I. Vanaskie, Kevin C. Quinn, Scranton, for appellant.
Howard M. Levinson, Mary Beth Connolly, Wilkes Barre, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
